hotels.title: Tranquil Self-Contained Villas Near Canggu with Private Pool and Garden Views
hotels.description: Experience the tranquillity of these modern private villas at this secluded sanctuary. Nestled in the heart of Badung, each villa is the epitome of curated Balinese design, with stark stone walls and refined wooden furniture contrasting against the azure waters of the private pool. Wake up to the gentle sounds of the nearby creek, recline on your private terrace with a lush garden, and then take full advantage of Umalas Creek's sauna, jacuzzi and cold-plunge pool. End your day by venturing out of your villa to savour authentic Indonesian cuisine at the nearby warungs and restaurants.
